li.label: transformed wild pawn
li.description: I'm not sure whether this is better or worse for them, but at least they're better equipped to survive.

li.label: transformed colonist
li.description: A colonist was turned into an animal. That's not right.

li.label: transformed prisoner
li.description: We turned a captive into an animal. I know they're our prisoner, but it seems wrong.

li.label: transformed guest
li.description: Someone came to our colony, and we betrayed that trust.

li.label: wild pawn merged
li.description: I really don't think they appreciated that at all.

li.label: colonist merged
li.description: We did mad science on one of our own, and now they're...horrifying.

li.label: prisoner merged
li.description: We did mad science on a captive. It's wrong to make them into a monster.

li.label: guest merged
li.description: Someone came to our colony for hospitality, and now they're an abomination.

li.label: wild pawn reverted
li.description: A wild person is human again. We did a good deed.

li.label: colonist reverted
li.description: A colonist is human again. We did a good deed.

li.label: prisoner reverted
li.description: At least it can be undone.

li.label: guest reverted
li.description: A guest is human again. Hopefully they'll trust us again, eventually.

li.label: colonist permanently feral
li.description: We knew it was coming...but now they can never be human again.

li.label: prisoner permanently feral
li.description: Did we really expect to turn them back?
